prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Guitar, Drums, Synth Pad, Bass, Piano, but without Reed.
captions:
Style 1:
This track features Piano, Bass, Guitar, Synth Pad, and Drums, but no Reed.

Style 2:
This composition is comprised of Guitar, Drums, Synth Pad, Bass, and Piano, omitting Reed.

Style 3:
Reed is absent from this song, which includes Piano, Bass, Guitar, Synth Pad, and Drums.
